name: lucky-punch
effect: Held by Chansey: Raises the holder’s critical hit counter by 2.
short_effect: Raises Chansey’s critical hit ratio by two stages.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A hold item that raises CHANSEY’s critical-hit rate.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that raises CHANSEY’s critical-hit rate.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A glove to be held by a CHANSEY. It raises CHANSEY’s critical-hit ratio.
